title: It's so FAST!!! - ASUS ROG GT-AX6000 WiFi 6 Router
tags: Your Home Internet Is About To Get An UPGRADE!
description: Thanks to ASUS ROG for sponsoring today's video! Check out the GT-AX6000 WiFi 6 router on Amazon at   Routers are basically a necessary item for your home since you're not going to connect just one item to the internet, and you want a good one to make sure everything that needs internet in your house gets a fast solid connection too. ASUS's GT-AX6000 router is something you might want to consider!
